model_answer: The correct chronological order of the events is: (1) The title card appears, (2) Hip-hop music starts playing, (3) The host welcomes the audience, (4) A black screen with the Eighth Amendment quote appears, (5) The host defines bail, (6) A black-and-white photo of the host appears, (7) The host signs off, invites subscriptions, and the music fades out. Therefore, the answer is A: 1 -> 2 -> 3 -> 4 -> 5 -> 6.

Georgia, which is related to this provision; fifth, he discusses executing minors and the mentally handicapped, mentions a Michigan case and “three strikes,” and invites debate in the comments.
